<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107408</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107408</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202715</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Introduction to Polar Coordinates</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in eine polaren Koordinaten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction aux coordonnées polaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução às coordenadas polares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione alle coordinate polari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στις πολικές συντεταγμένες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción a los coordenadas polares</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The student will be introduced to the definition of polar coordinates, how to graph them, and how to compare them to rectangular coordinates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Kursteilnehmer wird zur Definition der polaren
Koordinaten eingeführt, wie man sie graphisch darstellt und wie man 
sie mit rechteckigen Koordinaten vergleicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étudiant sera présenté à la définition des 
coordonnées polaires, comment les représenter graphiquement, et 
comment les comparer aux coordonnées rectangulaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estudante será introduzido à definição de 
coordenadas polares, como representá-las graficamente, e como 
compará-las às coordenadas retangulares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'allievo sarà introdotto alla definizione delle 
coordinate polari, come rappresentarle graficamente e come 
confrontarle alle coordinate rettangolari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σπουδαστής θα εισαχθεί στον καθορισμό των πολικών 
συντεταγμένων, πώς να τους δώσει με γραφική παράσταση, και πώς 
να τους συγκρίνει με τις ορθογώνιες συντεταγμένες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducirán al estudiante a la definición de 
coordenadas polares, cómo representarlos gra'ficamente, y cómo 
compararlos a los coordenadas rectangulares.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

FN:VICKY BURLINGTON
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107408</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/introduction-to-polar-coordinates</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
